name: LoveTech
description:
LoveTech

In the far off future of 2050, humanity is near the brink of extinction. 

The invention of the LoveBot by LoveTech has made child births plummet. Without children to replace them, humanity will soon have its last generation of people. People barely interact together, much less fall in love or have children. Succubi are out of jobs and slowly starving to death. 

To change this, four heroes have joined forces. Cupid, the God of Desire. Milphilia, the succubus. Hymen, the God of Marriages. and the Stork, who has been working at LoveTech to scope it out. 

Can our four heroes prevent humanity's extinction?

Game Features:

  • First person 3d Dungeon Crawler
  • 10 floors with multiple areas
  • 6 unique bosses
  • 30+ unique enemies
  • Customization of equipment.
  • Hitting enemy weaknesses to charge up TP and unleash Super Skills

UPDATE 2.22.22

Fixed the invisible vending machine issue

Made it so that you start with 1000 cash

Fixed the issue with dialogue on the Floor 9 Boss.
